issue.title: [C++] divide(duration, integer) -> duration kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14102](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14102). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Issue to track division of a duration by an integer.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14102?focusedCommentId=17479573) by Rok Mihevc (rokm):*
See ARROW-14101 for progress.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14102?focusedCommentId=17496835) by Rok Mihevc (rokm):*
